i1.name: Demon_Shade
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Evelynn''' gains ''Demon Shade'' after not performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking_stealth|break stealth]] for 4 seconds. Taking damage from enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} or {{tip|turret|turrets}} ends ''Demon Shade'' immediately and puts it on a {{fd|1.5}}-second {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}}.

{{sbc|Demon Shade:}} While below {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|250 to 590}} {{as|(+ 250% AP)}} health}}}}, '''Evelynn''' {{tip|heal|heals}} herself for {{pp|15 to 75}} every second. From [[Experience (champion)|level]] 6 onward, ''Demon Shade'' also grants {{tip|camouflage}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Evelynn gains Demon Shade after not performing actions that Stealth#Breaking_stealth for 4 seconds. Taking damage from enemy champions or turrets ends Demon Shade immediately and puts it on a 1.5-second static cooldown.
Demon Shade: While below 250 − 590 (based on level) (+ 250% AP) health, Evelynn heals herself for 15 − 75 (based on level) every second. From Experience (champion) 6 onward, Demon Shade also grants camouflage.
i1.notes:
* ''Demon Shade'' is also placed on a {{fd|1.5}} second cooldown upon [[death|respawning]].
* ''Demon Shade'' activates even if '''Evelynn''' is {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.
* Whenever ''Demon Shade'' activates, a puff of purple smoke will briefly appear around her.
[[File:Evelynn_Spotted.png|thumb|left|'''Evelynn''' being {{tip|sight|revealed}} in ''Demon Shade'' ''(post 6)''.]]

q1.name: Hate_Spike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' launches a dart in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
'''Evelynn's''' next 3 [[basic attack]]s or [[champion ability|abilities]] against the marked target deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
''Hate Spike'' may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.

{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Evelynn''' unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck. ''Hate Spike'' will first prioritize '''Evelynn's''' attack target, then the nearest {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy champion.
''A nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy is required to recast this ability.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn launches a dart in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and marking them for 4 seconds.
Evelynn's next 3 basic attacks or champion ability against the marked target deal bonus magic damage.
Hate Spike may be recast up to 3 times at no cost until the ability comes off cooldown.
Recast: Evelynn unleashes a line of deadly spikes in the direction of her attack target if they are in range, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck. Hate Spike will first prioritize Evelynn's attack target, then the nearest visible enemy champion.
A nearby visible enemy is required to recast this ability.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*3 to 50*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
{{st|Spike Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|25*3 to 45*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|25*4+10*3 to 45*4+50*3}} {{as|(+ 195% AP)}}}}
q1.notes:
* Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Hate Spike'' prioritizes:
*# The last champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The last non-champion '''Evelynn''' hit
*# The lowest-health champion
*# The lowest-health non-champion
* The dart applies {{tip|spell damage}} and the spikes deal {{tip|area damage}}.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* Recasts can be buffered up to {{fd|0.5}} seconds before becoming castable at a maximum range of approximately 500 units.

effects.str:
• Bonus Damage: (+ 25% AP)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 75% AP)

• Spike Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Damage: (+ 90% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 195% AP)

w1.name: Allure
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' ''curses'' the target enemy {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|monster}} for 5 seconds.
'''Evelynn's''' next [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]] against the ''accursed'' target ''expunges'' them, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 65% for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

''Expunging'' a target will refund ''Allure's'' {{as|{{sti|mana|mana cost}}}}. If the target is ''cursed'' for at least {{fd|2.5}} seconds, the ''expunge'' also {{tip|charm|charms}} them for a few seconds and the duration of the {{tip|slow}} is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.

Against champions, the ''expunge'' also {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|reduces their magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the ''expunge'' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and the {{tip|charm}} lasts 2 seconds longer.
''Casting Allure does not break {{ai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}} nor its fade into it.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn curses the target enemy champion or monster for 5 seconds.
Evelynn's next basic attack or champion ability against the accursed target expunges them, slowing them by 65% for 0.75 seconds.
Expunging a target will refund Allure's mana cost. If the target is cursed for at least 2.5 seconds, the expunge also charms them for a few seconds and the duration of the slow is increased to last for this time, as well as applying additional effects based on the target type.
Against champions, the expunge also reduces their magic resistance for 4 seconds.
Against monsters, the expunge deals bonus magic damage and the charm lasts 2 seconds longer.
Casting Allure does not break Evelynn's Demon Shade nor its fade into it.
leveling: {{st|Magic Resistance Reduction|{{as|{{ap|25 to 35}}%|magic resistance}}}}{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|250 to 450}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
* The mark fully forming signifies the {{fd|2.5}} seconds have elapsed, meaning the {{tip|charm}} will be applied on the triggering attack or ability.
** An enemy champion cursed by ''Allure'' is alarmed of her presence and after the mark has fully formed, an arrow will appear next to them pointing towards '''Evelynn's''' direction. This is visible to both teams.
* The {{stil|magic penetration}} will be applied to the attack or ability that triggers it.
* ''Allure's'' mark application on a target cannot be blocked by {{tip|spell shield}}.
** The expunge will not occur if the ability is blocked by a spell shield. The mark does not trigger and will remain on the target in this case.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away or no longer in {{tip|sight}} during the cast time, this ability will cancel but still go on {{sti|cooldown}} and pay its cost.{{bug}}
** ''Allure'' will restart its cooldown whenever the mark debuff is removed.{{bug}}

effects.str:
• Magic Resistance Reduction: %
  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP)

e1.name: Whiplash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
'''Evelynn''' also gains {{sti|ms|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
Gaining {{ai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}} resets ''Whiplash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} and {{ai|Empowered Whiplash|Evelynn|empowers}} its next cast.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn whips the target enemy with her lashers, dealing them magic damage and applying on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Evelynn also gains 30% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
Gaining Evelynn's Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and Evelynn's empowers its next cast.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|55 to 115}} {{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e1.notes:
* ''Whiplash'' can be {{tip|dodged}} and {{tip|blocked}} but may not miss if '''Evelynn''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 3% (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

e2.name: Empowered_Whiplash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing {{ccs|increased damage|magic}} to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.
''Empowered Whiplash'' only applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the primary target. The damage based on the target's health ratio deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against {{tip|monsters}}.
e2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn dashes toward the target enemy with her lashers, dealing Unknown value: ccs / increased damage / magic to them upon completion as well as to all enemies within her path.
Empowered Whiplash only applies on-hit effects to the primary target. The damage based on the target's health ratio deals a minimum of 25 and is capped at 450 against monsters.
leveling: {{st|Empowered Magic Damage|{{ap|75 to 175}} {{as|(+ 4% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.5}}% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
e2.notes:
* '''Evelynn''' will track the target if they change locations.
** She will dash to the target's previous location if the target moves {{tt|2000|Estimated}} or more units away.
** She will not stop tracking the target until she reaches them, as there is no maximum tracking distance.
* There is no time-out period on ''Empowered Whiplash''.
* ''Empowered Whiplash'' can be {{tip|blocked}} but cannot be {{tip|dodged}} and/or missed if '''Evelynn''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}
e2.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  0 as 0 and riot's value 40,45,50,55,60 as 40/45/50/55/60
e2.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '0' as '0' and riot's value '8,8,8,8,8' as '8'

effects.str: • Empowered Magic Damage: (+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 4% (+ 2.5% per 100 AP) of target's maximum health)

r1.name: Last_Caress
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Evelynn''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her in the target direction, before {{tip|blink|blinking}} 700 units in the opposite direction and becoming targetable again.
Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking {{as|magic damage}}, with enemies below {{as|{{sti|health|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} receiving {{ccs|140% '''bonus''' damage|magic}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Evelynn becomes untargetable as she reveals her true form to all enemies in front of her in the target direction, before blinking 700 units in the opposite direction and becoming targetable again.
Enemies caught in her reveal are devastated, taking magic damage, with enemies below 30% of their maximum health receiving Unknown value: ccs / 140% bonus damage / magic.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|125 to 375}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Empowered Damage|{{ap|125*2.4 to 375*2.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*2.4}}% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* ''Last Caress'' can be buffered during {{ai|Empowered Whiplash|Evelynn}}.
* The casting input controls the direction ''Last Caress' '' damage is dealt from, with the movement automatically happening in the reverse direction.
* Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} below the {{as|maximum health}} threshold are {{Color|pink|'''marked'''}} for '''Evelynn''', indicating the bonus damage opportunity.
* The screen will direct to '''Evelynn's''' position after she {{tip|blink|blinks}}.
{{ct|cast|spells=true,false,false,false,false}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 75% AP)
